properties.name: resources.root
properties.description: Where the PAS resources (e.g. templates, static files) are located. Mainly for image records.

properties.name: server.ip
properties.description: The IP address of the server. Used for generating URLs.

properties.name: resource.upload.dir
properties.description: The directory where uploaded resources are stored.

properties.name: unimtx.api.key
properties.description: The API key for the Unimatrix API.

properties.name: unimtx.send-otp.url
properties.description: The URL for sending an OTP via the Unimatrix API.

properties.name: unimtx.verify-otp.url
properties.description: The URL for verifying an OTP via the Unimatrix API.

properties.name: app.api-key
properties.description: The API key for the PAS API. Used for referral requests.

properties.name: resource.fetch.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable fetching resources from the Unimatrix API.

properties.name: resource.fetch.interval
properties.description: The interval at which to fetch resources from the Unimatrix API.

properties.name: resource.download.path
properties.description: The path to download resources from internet through fetching.

properties.name: pubmed.api.key
properties.description: The API key for the PubMed API.

properties.name: baidu.api.key
properties.description: The API key for the Baidu API.

properties.name: baidu.search.url
properties.description: The URL for searching resources via the Baidu API.

properties.name: bilibili.search.url
properties.description: The URL for searching resources via the Bilibili API.

properties.name: bilibili.cookie
properties.description: The cookie for the Bilibili API.

properties.name: python.path
properties.description: The executable path of Python. Used for running Python scripts.
